item.title: Lessons
item.description: Lessons Course Materials CLRS: Introduction to Algorithms, 4ed ADM: Algorithm Design Manual, 3ed Lessons # Slides Readings Exercises Projects Videos Foundations 1 Introduction to Algorithms CLRS 1; ADM 1.1, 1.2, 1.5 2 Correctness CLRS 2; ADM 1.3, 1.4, 1.6 3 Algorithm Analysis CLRS 2.2-2.3, 3; ADM 2 Data Structures 5 Lists CLRS: 10.2, 10.3; ADM: 3.1 6 Stacks and Queues CLRS 10.1; ADM 3.2 7 Hash Tables CLRS: 11; ADM: 3.
